channel.title: Need help with java client
channel.description:
Hey I wanted to make a private server for the Jagex game Arcanists and was wondering if anyone could tell me how to start by explaining how to make a launcher for the game? If you could explain how to make it also run from your own ip (Meaning have it so ur on a world by yourself) or any information you can provide about making such a server, that would be great.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Need help with java client
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I remember silab and I had a crappy server working a long time ago. It messed up loading a lot of sprites, though. I think I blamed it on failing to decompile it correctly. I don’t really remember anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with java client
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Are you really sigtinius? From what I’ve heard of sigtinius he doesn’t seem the type interested in a private server. I’d like to see you in game; it seems odd that you’d find this site in your search for a Arcanists private server (though not totally unbelievable)

Unfortunately I gave my Arcanists main away but I still have my RS account that I’ve played with it as well

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with java client
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

Get the JAR, decompile then deobfusicate it. Then figure out how to server works and create your own. No one has bothered to do this yet.

Now that I think about it, I might give it a try later.

Read full topic
